data.title: Slow down and smoke your cares away
data.text:
This is an awesome cigar lounge.  Paul; Efrim, and Andrew are knowledgeable and friendly.   The Cigar Vault is clean, bright and comfortable.  

The new owners have only had this place for about 3-4 months but the service and cigar selection is right on.  Efrim has plans to improve the patio area so smoking will be allowed outside with nice furniture and fire pits.
